author: TimonTerWijlen96
post_text: February 12, 2019 at 9:51 PM#1Hi guys 'n gurls!When I update a group, how is it possible to update the fx by using a macro. For example: I store my spot and wash groups into a group I use for dim fx, how can I update that fx so it use the fixtures I stored in the fx group?Let me know!
title: Change fixtures in effect by using macro
